website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but it's a "no noise" dog ID tag, as it uses a rubbery material that slides on the collar.
pros: Dog ID tag offered in multiple colors and multiple sizes, so it can fit on different sizes of collars
Allows for up to 5 lines of printed text
Rectangular-shaped ID tag has cut outs, so it easily slides over a collar and stays in place
With its rubbery material, it's quiet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog tag. Very high quality. Exceptional customer service as well! I highly recommend and will be a returning customer when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: TaraAnnG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Our Jack Russell broke off every collar because he was rubbing it in to the carpet or getting it caught on things. I think he actually hurt his neck because he yanked on it too hard the last time he hooked it on something. This was perfect. I think that next time I will get a slightly smaller size (I bought the large size) because he still manages to turn it around with his constant rubbing and rolling, but at least I know it won't come off anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sipple

customer_reviews.title: great tag... no tags jingling
customer_reviews.text: Great ID tag for dogs and doesn't jingle making noise when my dog runs and plays or even just walks around. Been on beach with dog for past 2 weeks and tag has held up great even though dog in water constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Printing doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husky/Akita mix because her and her brother play so rough. The last one I had used elastic to hold onto the collar and that got ripped in just a week. This one, while it was super sturdy for their play, has become illegible. I was really hoping it would hold up because my mix is scared of strangers and this had nice, huge letters for people to see if they got even semi-close to her. Also, the color of the print ink was too dark in the first place. A dark black or bright white would have stood out more for the time it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Centaurette

customer_reviews.title: Great Noiseless Streamlined Dog tag
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I agree the white looks like a hospital tag that's our only dislike. We should have purchased another color. We purchased this for our very active 1yr old black and tan GSD. We love the softness and ease of install. Great if your looking for a streamlined noiseles dog tag.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this tag! It was done very well, the printing is excellent, Delivery was fast, and the overall quality is super. Fits well on my dogs collar, does not slide around, and serves to show the world how they can help without somebody having to reach under his chin to see who he is, which might cause problems under some circumstances. So this tag makes me much more comfortable should he ever get lost.
customer_reviews.author: April Grace Baker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: This tag looks nice when you first get it, but it doesn't hold up. I've been using this tag since May and by September it was showing wear and several of the lines of text are illegible. They say it has a 5 year warranty, but what good is that when customer service does not answer the phone or return your message? Save your money and go with the similar slide on tags that are made of metal with a silicone backing.
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use the beastie bands for my dogs (just for ID purposes) and this fit them perfectly. It is soft and comfortable which is important because my dogs sleep in their collars. The words are visible and there is plenty of room. I put our home phone, our cell phone, and our city and state. I don't put the dog's name. This way there is more room for the important info and the tags are interchangeable between different dogs. I like this better than the dangling tags because it's silent and it's less likely for the dog to get its collar caught on something. Also I don't want a ring on the collar because we use harnesses for walks.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was great for my cat
customer_reviews.text: With all the license tags and rabies tags then name/ID etc around their neck...I am happy to have this light weight tag for my cat to have all that info in one place that wouldn't be something that catches on every branch, leaf etc he gets in contact with. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: What a great find. Meets and Exceeds my expectations. I wanted my dog name/contact information printed on my dogs collar rather than hang from a tag but I didn't like any of the options. I found this and figured I could get it and put it on any collar I wanted. Once it arrived, I was worried it wouldn't fit or break when trying to put it on the collar yet it pretty thick and stretched to fit over the buckles no problem. I only had 2 lines on the tag so you can see dog name/my phone number very easily. The dog doesn't even notice it is on. Highly Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gunniwolf

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my picky dog
customer_reviews.text: So I got this super cool rescue dog that I named Ike, dude is super chill. Nothing seems to phase him; obnoxious puppy jumping on his head-no worries, toddler pulling at his ears-no worries, thunder/lightning-no worries, fireworks-no worries, attach a jingly tag to his collar-THE END OF THE WORLD! It seriously ruined this dog when I tried attaching a tag to his collar, would not move AT ALL. Just frozen in place in fear. Can't have that! This is the perfect alternative. No noise, doesn't dangle to get caught on anything, and I was able to get his name, my phone number, and his microchip info on there with no worries, still all very legible. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyJonez

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this tossed the end of January and it arrived promptly. It included nice, bold engraving that was requested and seemed very sturdy when we first put it on. Unfortunately, less than two months later, it broke right at one of the top corners. While it looks nice and appears to be a good idea, I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Min

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea. It went on great, good size however only have had it a few weeks and can't hardly read the information on it. Black with white writing. He is a inside dog and it hasn't even gotten dirty yet.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell you why this looked good to me. My Shipoo EllieMae has a new fluffy bed. We woke up and she was sitting in the fluffy bed. I had coffee took a shower and she was still just sitting in the bed? I went to check on her and was alarmed to see that she was STUCK in her fluffy bed! OMG! The hanging metal tag hooked onto the fluff somehow and the poor baby was stuck for God only knows how long! I am loving these flat comfortable and quiet tags! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: colleen anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for a bird hunting dog!
customer_reviews.text: as of the day I opened it and put it on my dogs collar I am happy with it. Its for a hunting dog so I will update with how it holds up after some time in the field. Update: After some training in the fields the tag is no longer usable. From rubbing against the brush it tore and won't stay on the collar. So for my use it won't work. I'd say for a lazy hpuse dog it would hold up OK but for a working dog it isn't tough enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: its me

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: If you hate the sound of jingling pet tags or want a sleeker option - this is for you!!! We absolutely LOVE this rubber tag! We purchased the M size and it's perfect! It's sturdy but soft and is easily readable from a distance. It lays flat against the collar and looks to be great quality! We've had it for a month or so and it looks the same as the day it arrived - so far no fading! Great design and good quality. I'll try to remember to come back and give an update but so far I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Deku

customer_reviews.title: Silent Slide On Pet I.D. Tag - Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: So far I couldn’t be more pleased with this purchase. It’s secure on collar, doesn’t hang down to get caught on objects and isn’t made if metal to conduct heat/cold. It’s easy to read, securely attaches to collar, and provides all necessary pet/owner information. I’d definitely purchase again. In fact I’m planning to purchase another tag to put on my horse’s halter in case of emergency. Excellent seller, product and delivery, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our little wanderer. We moved to a new town and my husband was worried Stella would run off. The dangley I'd tag drove her mad so I ordered this. I forgot to change our address on my order so it was in no mans land for a while. The seller was so kind and we finally received it. So far kitty hasn't strayed but I can rest assured, she will make her way home with her new I'd tag.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E. Brackeen

customer_reviews.title: Black tag loses its legibility
customer_reviews.text: I may have read a review about the black tag fading & becoming eligible, but doubted the review. Well, the black tag has lost legibility after a few months. Can't read my dog's name (top line). I would recommend a lighter color background. I purchased the smaller & lighter color for #2 dog and that tag is still quite legible. Would likely purchase again in lighter background color for doggo #1.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the way this fit our dog’s collar. And liked it for the first month. But now the color has worn off which makes it very hard to read after just a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Malenchik

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this name tag. For me and my dog this idea is far better then a hanging tag, it’s a good looking tag that appears to be comfortable for my little buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Engraving looks really clear and the material is flexible but strong!
customer_reviews.text: This material is flexible but really strong. I just slid it over her collar and it stretched over the hooks and all the adjustment sections on the collar. I think I could have gone up a size to slide over her collar, but this size was still easy to get on. Looks really great! I love that it's quiet. I tried to get a couple of clear pictures of her tag, but it's hard to get a sharp picture of writing up close. But I hope these 2 pictures help you.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I like the nametag, but the underlying material is gray, so there is not the amount of contrast that the ad for it shows. It is hard to read, but does the job. (I blacked out my personal info in the photo!)
customer_reviews.author: MML in SC

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was quite. I got tired of the jiggles of the vaccine and the name tag all the time when he walked or itched. So I made a note on the plate that Boomers Vaccines were up to date- he's chipped along with his Mom phone # on it. it's prefect for him swimming in the lake . A little expensive but I think it's going to work out well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Warrell

customer_reviews.title: Great tag for our Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: We love the silicone easy to stretch dog tag! We were even able to stretch it over our girl's clasp collar. It's cute, readable and not noisy. Perfect. thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love this company!
customer_reviews.text: These are great dog tags. Very easy to put on and the company is awesome to work with because I recently had an issue with the font and they totally resolve the issue with a perfect outcome! They have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I thought it would be but it was the right size for my dog collar. No more dog tag clinking on the dog bowl in the middle of the night. Now if I can just get her to stop licking herself.
customer_reviews.author: David VanderSchuur

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed and wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Ordered the largest one and it's perfect! My dog had a homemade collar our of 550cord and did not have a spot at attached a normal name tag with a ring. So this was absolutely perfect, just slid it on and was done!! Color is great! Can see words and numbers great!!
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this three months ago; it was delivered two months ago. I wasn't able to use it for another month as I was away from home with my dogs. When I did get home, I finally put it on my dog's collar. A month later, the edge/opening broke. It is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: goldngemgirl

customer_reviews.title: Printing faded
customer_reviews.text: Printing faded in less than 3 months. Barely visible now. Other than that, it fit the collar. Nice idea for a tag even though it's overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: B. Just

customer_reviews.title: Wears out
customer_reviews.text: Letters almost worn out after only 4 months. We do have a Labrador that like to swim a lot maybe thats part of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: massage therapist

customer_reviews.title: hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I like the product material and it fit the collar well....BUT I got the black with gray letters and it is difficult to read...there is not enough contrast.....for the price I am returning...bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bright, readable text and seems quite durable
customer_reviews.text: We got this so our border collie could wear her tag all the time without jangling 24/7. It works perfectly. Had no trouble stretching it over the buckle of the collar. Very readable, comfortable for the dog, and silent.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but love them
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My youngest lost her name tag in a short time. She likes to go swimming and roll in the sand at the beach (when I say roll I mean roll) These hold up great. I like this style and will continue to use these!
customer_reviews.author: arlena reed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this style because his metal name tag had the information worn off from rubbing against his license tag. Being silent was not a factor for us. It fit perfectly on the 1” collar and stays in place! I love the size of the print! It’s perfect for our Gunny!
customer_reviews.author: rplpal

customer_reviews.title: Rubs hair off long haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: This rubbed my Yorkies neck of all the hair. He kept scat Hong at his neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product, only shipping option is slow boat.
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i needed as a gift item. i messaged seller asking for expedited shipping. essentially i was told i couldn't afford it. i had already investigated shipping prices and was totally prepared to pay high shipping costs to satisfy my gifting need. the tag is a 5 star item. 1 star removed for deciding what i can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Ray O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Does not pull his fur or move around like crazy. Very sturdy and looks nice. Arrived in a timely matter. So far I'm very impressed. Never had a dog tag like this. My dog is a labrador pitbull and he is wearing the size Medium/Large.
customer_reviews.author: DesiRay

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these dog tags. I was tired for my dogs shaking or scratching in the night, while I was trying to sleep, and their tags clanging against the metal ring on their collar. So I bought these they are the best. Made well, the imprint on them is very easy to read. I only did three lines so my dogs name shows up very nice. I would definitely buy these again. I have already recommended them to my friends. No more clanging dog tags for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Dow

customer_reviews.title: No lost dog here! No way!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm!! Doesn’t fall off, looks cool, dog stays home!! Winner winner chicken dinner!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. King

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After having this on my dogs collar, it faded horribly and you can’t read anything on the tag. Had to purchase something more study and engraved. Waste of money. Too bad because I liked it at first.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT W MALLORY

customer_reviews.title: Like this tag
customer_reviews.text: My puppy likes to chew on her tags. She destroyed her rabies tag and other ID tags we put on her collar. She can't get this one and I haven't noticed it fading yet. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slide on and read
customer_reviews.text: We just got ours and put it on. We got an XL and stretched to fit over the clasp. Font is very easy to read and it can fit my full name, address and phone number. We kept losing the rings for the other tag, which was tiny and got dirty. Would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t lose your dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs- 100 lbs & 10 lbs. I got these name tags for both. The whole name tag is foam-like. You slide it onto the collar. It has stayed put. This is certainly going to work but I would have preferred a sturdier tag.
customer_reviews.author: Chelley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy silicone
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy silicone -black ink staying on the grey tag nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this
customer_reviews.text: We found that when attached to our dog's collar, it started to chafe his neck. We put it on the back of his harness instead. I've noticed over time that it seems the lettering is fading.
customer_reviews.author: heinzyee

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this new tag. Very durable, well made, clear print. Much more comfortable for my puppy than a metal tag. Completely silent. No clanking like metal hang tags. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Cblovessb

customer_reviews.title: No clinking of tags.
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy loves to get up and roam during the night. Now with just the rabies tag and this new name tag, we don't hear him jumping around during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Doug F Tampa/Louisville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dog. She is still a puppy and some how manages to chew on the traditional type of dog tags. She can’t chew on this one!! It looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: amyrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice looking and doesn’t rattle all night when my doggo moves in my bed. The collar I put it on was a bit wide but it still fit on there fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see and very comfortable for Lucy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the large print, it is easy for people to read! I had this for several months now and it is holding up very well. Lucy does not try to remove it or chew on it, seems to be very comfortable for her! I've also had several people asking where I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative dog tag. Wording color fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I never have to worry about my dogs chain breaking. Great alternative to regular dog tag. Only disappointment is that the wording color quickly fades. Still legible but more difficult to see. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Seem sturdy and look good
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice tags unfortunately I could not use them due to I have collars that are slip on that I use to walk them. Their other collars that I use for them when they go to dog park or doggy day care have their name and my phone number embroidered on them
customer_reviews.author: sheri walkowiak

customer_reviews.title: Fits on thinner collars perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tag. Not dangling & he does try to pull it off. My dog has a thin leather collar so it fits well. Not suitable for thicker collars because ends can’t stretch over latches. Otherwise perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: BroadwayMom

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, prompt service with a handwritten note from the seller. Material is sturdy, but flexible. Lettering is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Letters/numbers started to fade
customer_reviews.text: i purchased 2 for my dogs and I'm sorry to report that after only several months the letters and numbers have faded where you can barely read it.
customer_reviews.author: honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog tag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog tag!!! Not posting a pic due to privacy with our address etc. My dog kept chewing on his typical dog tags and this he has no idea it is even there after the first day. Very soft, durable, and sturdy. We have had this tag since May and it still looks like new. I'm going to order for our other 2 dogs too.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for our dogs. They were nice for a few weeks but then, two of the dogs chewed them off each other’s collars. My other dogs still have the on their collars, Sadly the lettering has faded off the tags. Lot money for poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! No more jingling tags, and don’t have to worry about tags getting caught in things. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this my dog likes to rub/bite off tag so this is great. Good idea for if dog gets away tags can break off.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Blatz

customer_reviews.title: unusable
customer_reviews.text: After 2 days in the sun, you can't read the print on the product. It is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Peters

customer_reviews.title: As Promised
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Fits easily over strap of harness. Easily visible if someone looking to identify pet. The writing could be a little darker but that is just the color I chose. I plan to order another one for my other dog just wanted to try it first. Innovative design no flapping against state mandated rabies tags as other tags do.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits the size of the collar. It also looks like it would be pretty durable but my puppy has been having dry skin and itches his collar a lot so we shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Manda J

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Durable Tag
customer_reviews.text: Love this tag for our golden. Large letters, very durable and easy to slide on any collar!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey & Katie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Love that is flat and much safer than tags that hang down. It is a great buy! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Will likely be the last one I have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cena

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This actually ended up being my favorite tag. Super bold writing and very durable. Fits on all kinds of collars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not intrusive or annoying to my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well on my (smallish) ten pound cat. No noise and he is not irritated in any way by it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Tag faded.  Company responded sent a new tag.
customer_reviews.text: The tag faded within a month. I have a very active dog that plays with other dogs. Contacted company. They sent me a new tag. Will see how the next one works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will faded.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June/July 2019 and it faded within a few months. It's completely gone now.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lemos

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This ID tag works great, easy to put on and doesn't snag in the fur. Name is easy to read. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Love this custom dog tag! We ordered this cause I was tired of hearing the jingle of metal tags. This solved that problem. It's sturdy, looks great, and best of all... Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: David Small

customer_reviews.title: Good experience
customer_reviews.text: The tag arrived quickly and was well represented by the seller's photo. It stretched and slid on my pet's collar over the rather chunky buckles. I can't speak to durability as we haven't had it long enough. I will update this in a couple of months. In general, we were pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Words were clear on both of the different sizes I ordered. Slid nicely into both sizes as well. Seem sturdy and we’re worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: renee baylard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have had it on one dog for a month several months and ordered another one for our new puppy. Letters still look like new. Nice not to hear tags jingle. Very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our dog and it faded within a month or so. I was very disappointed because I love everything else about it. Somehow after awhile It got torn too, so the material isn’t super sturdy. I wrote an email to the manufacturer and got no reply whatsoever. Again, disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: It fit my dogs large collar- it was over 1 inch in width
customer_reviews.text: Loved the overall size and the font size. The way it fits on the collar is perfect and overall look great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Clear lettering and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tag slipped onto my dog's collar easily because it stretches. I bought a black tag with white lettering and it's clear to see. I don't know yet if it will wear away or hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: MT0130

customer_reviews.title: Inscription wears off pretty much immediately
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this tag until about day five. It’s nice because it’s lightweight and durable however the information printed on the tag is already wearing off. One star for failure to serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great For Everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is great for your pet, keep on your person as ID and has fantastic quality and readability. Think about putting it in your purse or in the pocket of something you don't want to loose so its returned to you. This stands up to all kinds of grass, mud, rain, and fur your pet gets into at a day in a lake or just playing with one of their best furry friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legible & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tag is large enough to be seen. We have a very active farm stock dog, she also loves to swim, tag still looks good
customer_reviews.author: cathye schafer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the tag looks and would recommend the purchase but I think the price is quite high. I think more people would make the purchase if the cost was lower.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: After ready several reviews that these were too small or did not fit their pet collars, I ordered a size up. It is WAY TOO BIG for my pets collar. Big, loose, sloppy... Very disappointed. No fault of the company - appears to be a decent product, but definitely does not run small.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Temporary tag at best
customer_reviews.text: brought this tag in June, unreadable by September. the nice white letters disappeared leaving black on black. hard to tell its a name tag without a magnifying glass to make out the black letters. went to country max brought a engraved metal tag. should have done that in the first place would've saved $17. bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This tag shipped very quickly and it came out so cute! I love it! I know a few of the previous reviews said that the text wears off after time, so I’ll make to update this review in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Best doggie gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on Patch Adams Collar. Very study and attractive. Great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth W

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Seem durable print is a tiny bit on the light side.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Love this tag
customer_reviews.text: Our dog hates things dangling on her collar, so this has been great. Very visible and easy to read. Very happy with this product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoviFanatic

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Was hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money in my optimism. Quality is just ok and the size does NOT match what is listed. Order up at least one size so it fits ok your dogs collar.
customer_reviews.author: Sara G.

customer_reviews.title: Print on tag
customer_reviews.text: The idea for this product appealed to me since I don’t like the metals tags. The piece was easy to slide on the collar, and it has held up with my active German Shepard. The biggest issue is the print on the tag fades so easily that within a few months it was nonexistent. This totally defeats its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: philip s.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a tag!
customer_reviews.text: It is just as pictured! So much better than a tag. Very durable and legible.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Low

customer_reviews.title: Silent tag
customer_reviews.text: Good solution for a silent tag. My dog is afraid of the clinking noise. Soft rubber material. Text seems a touch on the light side, but still legible. Tag doesn't shift on collar.
customer_reviews.author: eevans

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: It came covered in ink and you could barely read the words
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tag! Doesnt make any noise when my dog shakes her head. Stays on her collar and it’s easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Print color too light, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Really like the grey tag but unfortunately the print color is too light. Makes it difficult to read. It fits the dog collar perfectly and is silent. Ahh, no jingling.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like nothing about it it was not how it looks in pick this is not ok I'm very upset it is so cheap and it is just the tag so it sucks it's not what I thought I was getting. I dont recommend no one to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This was a great dog id tag. The only issue I had was my puppy pulled on my other dogs and ripped it in half. She then got her collar off and destroyed her's.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!!!! Just what I was looking for!! Is soft, really legible and comfortable for my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Karime

customer_reviews.title: Well worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on collar. And the material is flexible and thick enough I don't need to worry about it tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Christl

customer_reviews.title: Best dog tag EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best product I ever purchased. I LOVE these tags. They’re quiet, durable, and really nice looking. I love that they are made in The USA and they even have a 5 year warranty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Gauntt

product_meta.title: Silent Slide On Pet ID Tags - Premium Pet IDs - Safe Silicone Rubber - Custom Engraved, Waterproof for Dogs and Cats - 5 Lines of Personalized Text
product_meta.description:
Size:L (Fits 1" Wide Collars)| Color:Black

Our Tags are unique, SAFE and made to last.

They are the only fully rubber slide on pet tag designed to stretch and secure over all collars.

We started out on our journey one year ago to create not only the World's Best Pet Tag but Your Dog's Favorite Tag. We did this by creating a durable innovative design which keeps your pet comfortable and away from the hazards caused by traditional hang tags.

Not only are our tags functional. They’re also stylish, informative, secure and silent. Our tags are engraved not printed. This means our tags will never fade.

Friends don't let friends wear hang tags. Get your dog a DOG COLLAR TAG!
feature_bullets: SAFE, STYLISH & COMFORTABLE - Pet IDs are made of a durable and cat and dog safe rubber that slips on over clips and slides on the collar allowing it to be used with snap closure collars, adjustable belt buckle collars or harnesses. It flexes and adjusts to the curve of your pet’s neck providing an ultra comfortable fit. Metal or stainless steel tags can scratch your pet’s neck. Our tags are made of a soft flexible silicone rubber that looks great and fits comfortably. Perfect for Dogs and Cats

NO MORE ANNOYING JINGLE NOISE – Our noiseless id tags fit close to your pet’s neck and are completely silent unlike traditional hanging pet tags. Our unique one piece design not only solves this problem; it keeps your pet safe from the dangers of stainless steel slide on tags with unmatched quality.

STRONG TAGS WON'T GET CAUGHT OR FALL OFF - Hang tags are bound to get caught on household items. Our name tags stretch and secure over collar clips allowing them to fit flat on any collar. No need for rivets or hang tags! You pick the color add a name and up to four lines of personalized text. Six sizes include (3/8", 1/2", 5/8", 3/4" 1" and 1.25 inch) colors include grey, orange, rust (brown with orange text), white and black.

Revised 11/22/19 - WILL NOT FADE -Deep laser engraving is permanent, clear, easy to read, waterproof, sand proof and won’t fade. The material can be easily cleaned for the most active and messiest of pets. Have peace of mind your lost pet will be returned our tags won't wear.

TAGS ARE MADE IN USA & SHIPPED IN TWO BUSINESS DAYS! - Keep your pet safe by treating your dog or cat to their favorite vet recommended tag! Click customize now to begin! Please note: *COLLAR NOT INCLUDED*
